meanings.sent1: She outsteps her friends in running races.
meanings.sent2: The athlete outsteps the competition in every race.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit outsteps the turtle in the race, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outsteps any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The cheetah's speed outsteps all other animals in the savanna.

meanings.definition: To go beyond in taking steps.
meanings.sent1: He outsteps his daily goal of steps on his fitness tracker.
meanings.sent2: The hiker outsteps the marked trail and discovers a hidden waterfall.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous explorer outsteps the boundaries of the map.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity outsteps her fear of the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The child's imagination outsteps the limits of reality.

meanings.sent1: The company outsteps its competitors in innovation.
meanings.sent2: The river outsteps its banks during the heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The snail outsteps its usual pace and wins the race.
meanings.sent4: His ambition outsteps his current position in the company.
meanings.sent5: The rocket outsteps the atmosphere and enters space.
